remarks: Express composition of two functions as a maps-to applying both in sequence.  This version has one less distinct variable restriction compared to ~ fcompt .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2017.)
statement:
fcomptf.1 $e |- F/_ x B $.
fcomptf $p |- ( ( A : D --> E /\ B : C --> D ) -> ( A o. B ) = ( x e. C |-> ( A ` ( B ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d E x $.
